    1 out of 1 found this review helpful

    High quality chef knife. Handle placement is very good. We were worried the rubber-type grip handle would be cheesy or cheap, but it is actually really nice, and very helpful to prevent slips. Very good chef knife. Better than my Cutco version, and MUCH better than my Dexter one.

    Lindsay K. Posted on 02/14/2017

    I am satisfied with the purchase of this chef knife for my kitchen . The steel blade and the durable handle make this a no brained

    Richard T. Posted on 01/27/2018

    This is an awesome chef knife! It can withstand a lot of use and it a great choice for any restaurant. It is well made and it lasts a long time.

    Jean H. Posted on 01/19/2018

    This chef knife is really good at being able to get all sorts of prep work done. The length is ideal, it's both functional and easy to wield

    Saxon M. from Town Square Market Posted on 12/14/2017

    This is an excellent knife for the price! Highly recommend it for a home or commercial establishment. I think that you could get two, alternate, and not need another knife for a decade!

    Saxon M. from Town Square Market Posted on 10/28/2017

    Mercer makes good knives and this isn't an exception. It is a great price for what I got. It is sturdy and a nice size for smaller amounts of food that I need to chop.

    Treva P. from Treva's Pastries and Fine Foods Posted on 08/16/2017

    Had to get this 8" chefs knife to go with the st of the mercer millennia knive I've got .have to admit I'm a huge fan of Victorinox but Mercer knives are awesome too

    Manuel C. Posted on 05/26/2017

    Just got it in today and it is going be put to the test today

    This knife really helps me cut herbs into tiny little pieces to put in soups for when my kids are sick . And the good thing is they don't know about it

    Lalit p. from Foxland market Posted on 05/17/2017

    Awesome Knife, great quality, Blade stays sharp for a good amount of time between sharpening, Great quality for the price compared to some other knives out there!

    Jason D. Posted on 04/30/2017

    I LOVE THIS KNIFE. I was using a knife of another brand before buying this knife and this one is so much better. The handle makes controlling this knife easy. It has a non-slip feel to it and is very comfortable. Highly recommend!

    Michael C. Posted on 03/15/2017

    My first non cheap knife block knife and this knife is my new favorite kitchen item. The knife effortlessly slices through anything i have thrown at it. The handle is very nice and strong. Overall this knife is a tremendous value.

    Malik H. Posted on 01/04/2017

    Mercer M22608 Millennia 8" Chef Knife is a great knife in the hand. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a high quality knife at a great price.

    Lauren K. Posted on 12/27/2016

    We absolutely love these knives and use them for all our everyday kitchen needs! We love the array of colors that they come in and we use them along with the blades for safe storage. Would recommend for any and all kitchens.

    Ariel R. Posted on 12/24/2016

    My experience with Mercer products has been good. This knife is an excellent value choice with a sharp edge and comfortable grip. With this knife chopping has never been easier.

    Ruth C. Posted on 11/23/2016

    The Mercer M22608 millennia 8 inch Chef Knife is great. It is really sharp. It is nice and light and well balanced. The handle is well designed. I would definitely purchase it again. For the price it can't be beat.

    Bruce B. Posted on 08/20/2016

    I've used many chefs knives and these Mercer Zmillennia series are excellent. Nice balance, nice handle, and the price is super good. I'llbe using only these now.

    Lawrence S. from H & L on the Hudson Posted on 08/03/2016

    Great knife

    So far, this knife has been wonderful to use. It has a nice weight to it and it's been great for cutting cakes/dough strips/fruits, etc. Nice handle with a good grip to hold onto.

    Anna N. from Honeybee Patisserie Posted on 07/09/2016

    Maybe the best knife I've used in a long time and at a price that is very good to the budget. Very sharp and holds its sharpness even in restaurant

    Jeremy H. from Village grill and more Posted on 06/06/2016

    The Mercer knife handle is easy to hold. I love the grip. Your hands definitely wont slip. This knife is very sharp and the price is reasonable. It's also stainless steel. Feels like it was made from quality steel. I highly recommend this knife.

    Annmarie R. Posted on 02/19/2016

    I use these knives for my sharpening service they have a nice profile that does not get thick after a few sharpenings also good height at heel to keep you safe when chopping close to the heel, Highly recommended decent edge retention for a stamped knife.

    Chris W. from cincy sharp Posted on 01/11/2016

    Perfect Chef knife for the price. Lightweight but not too light the blade has a good thickness to it and the handle comfortable and non-slip.

    Anthony D. Posted on 01/05/2016

    Overall a good knife. Its keeps its edge well, but its fairly light weight. Excellent for vegetables, but the cooks like a heavier knife for meats.

    Anthony C. Posted on 11/24/2015

    By far my favorite that I bought, great for dicing and slicing pretty much anything. Had a hefty handle making it easy to control. Will definitely buy a backup.

    Sol B. Posted on 02/20/2015

    Chef knife

    Works great and stays sharp for a long time. Handle is easy to use and comfortable to hold. This is important as I have arthritis in my hands. Makes chopping veggies much easier.

    Toni L. from Sparky's Cantina Posted on 01/05/2015

    This is a good quality chef and kitchen knife, it's sharp too. Every kitchen should have a few of these, Mercer is a high quality manufacturer that produces professional use culinary utensils, the price is outstanding for this knife also.

    Francisco D. from FRANK DIEGUEZ Posted on 12/17/2014

    This knife is made of good quality steel and comes pretty sharp. The handle is made of both black plastic and black grippy rubber which feels nice in the hand.

    Cory H. from Home Posted on 11/28/2014

    The Mercer 8" Chef's Knife works great. It carries a solid, sharp edge and takes to honing and sharpening well enough. It is sturdy and holds up to the stresses of the kitchen.

    Facilities U. Posted on 03/03/2014

    I've used this knife everyday for the past 6 months and love it. No knife I've ever owned has been as sharp or stayed sharp as long as this one. Recently it has gone missing from work and I've had to use the ones the restaurant owns and can not complete my work in time, do to the constant dulling, causing me to need to sharpen the knives continuasly, taking up precious time, so I'm back to get another Mercer Millennia 8" chef knife to make my job easier. I will never use another brand again.

    Ronald C. Posted on 02/16/2014

    Love this knife! It is a great medium sized knife. It is very sharp, surprisingly sturdy, and somewhat heavy (perfect weight for this size knife). I cannot believe this knife is such great quality at such a low price.

    Marsha G. Posted on 02/01/2014

    Great knife for the price and very sharp. We actually ordered a knife set by the same manufacturer from another company and I am happy with the quality of their Mercer's products.

    Erika S. Posted on 08/22/2013

    Just what we were looking forward. It has a nice and firm grip on it. The blade stays sharp and has good weight on it.

    Chris F. from The Waves Restaurant Posted on 08/06/2013

    These knives are fantastic. I ordered one for the church and liked it so well that I ordered this one for home use. Amazingly sharp and well balanced.

    David R. Posted on 06/12/2013

    Great all around knife to use in the kitchen from chopping to dicing and much more. The knife is very comfortable in your hand making it easy to maneuver. Very durabable blade, easy to sharpen and maintain. LOVE IT!!

    Michael C. from IC Catering Posted on 05/08/2013

    This is a great beater knife to have. Its cheap and sharpening the blade is fast and easy. Its my go to knife when I'm on the line.

    Aaron H. Posted on 01/11/2013

    I absolutely love this knife! I have been using Mercer knives for about 2 years now, and they have never let me down! The 8 inch is the perfect utility knife for any kitchen!

    Eric S. Posted on 12/19/2012

    Ive used alot of knives in my kitchen but this is my favorite.I use it for everything from sliceing to diceing. I love the balance and the handle is perfect!
